review: I was addicted with alchohol, and i was facing some serious health problems,but after taking medicine now im feeling well, and now im living like sober life, definitely recommended to anyone who is facing and trying to living helthy life liquor free life.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was having severe stomach ache on Sunday 14 th Feb 21 since 4 PM. I consulted in Emergency clinic of the hosp at 2 AM on night of 14th/15th. There was not much relief. Next day on 15th Feb pain was still continuing and I consulted Dr Prabha Ramadurai at Nano hisp at 1245 PM. She thouroughly examined my stomach area and advised for immediate Ultrasound scan as she suspected inflammation of appendix. She also advised me to consult a surgeon immediately if the appendicitis is confirmed. I underwent the scan at 4 PM and it revealed the same problem. I got admitted at 5 30 PM same day at Fortis hosp and the surgery was done on 16th. The doctor's correct diagnosis and timely advise helped me to take proper action. Thank you Dr Prabha Ramadurai.
reply_text:
Happy to know that you are doing well.
Thank you for your kind words.I am really happy I was able to help you.ðŸ‘ƒ

review: Visited her for my momâ€™s body aches and headache. She prescribed medicines for 10 days **** *** *** ******* ***** ** *** *** ***** ***** **** **** ** *** * ** ***********  We visited her again and after listening to our reason for 2nd visit, she simply said - The body is not responding to medication and I am referring you you Ortho. Plus, she was not very friendly and cut me off several times with random response, while I was explaining my momâ€™s current state. Very disappointed.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
We had gone there with recent reports including MRI scan and blood tests that were prescribed by a remote family doctor. However this doctor didn't pay much attention to that nor was interested in hearing out the symptoms/ patient history and instead chided for showing a report summary on the mobile phone instead of print out.

She then asked to do a few blood tests, some of which were already done and there in the report and suggested that we do the tests and consult with her and she would then suggest whether a neurologist is required.

***** *** ****** *** *** ** *** ***** ** **** *** *** ** ***** **** **** ***** But asking to repeat tests without looking at existing report gave a very bad impression.

tags: None
review: Doctor was very friendly. She asked all the questions regarding health issues. She will communivated in English however we are not comfortable with kannada/Tamil/Hindi.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: She has asked all the relevant questions and also took enough time to listen from our side as well. Instead of prescribing unnecessary tests she has suggested very minimal medicines which was a good thing. We will be meeting her soon again for follow up check up. I just recommend her to others as well.
reply_text:
Thank you for your good words
Prabha

review: Visited for throat burn ( acidity)  and breathing problem.  Doc was patient, she heard all my concerns. Doesn't prescribe unnecessary medicines or tests. She gave me a gastric tablet and one antacid to drink. I was relieved in one day itself. I would surely recommend her.
